name: Fine China
description: Fine China is a VR 'you-break-it-you-buy-it' simulator for the HTC Vive, in which you have to make your way through an antique store without breaking too much.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires HTC Vive to play
